Articles.Content:
Happy Chinese New Year!!!

I wish you all happiness, prosperity and safe landings! 

For those wondering what's going on: Chinese people use the regular calendar for business, just like most English speaking people, but use a Moon calendar for finding out when to celebrate a party: New Year! And that's right now! We are going into the Year of the Rooster.

You know, I just randomly thought of it and as this year is the year of the Fire Rooster, if you turn it into Chinese for each word then translate it back into English, you end up with the Year of the Turkey....
Gong Xi Fa Cai, Happy Year of the Rooster!

Wait what? Its Chinese new years? Im so ignorant how did i not know!

Happy year of the rooster!
